snippet.title: ✅  Johnny Depp says Amber Heard called him a 'fat old man' & married him for 'fame'
snippet.description:
💖 Please Visit: https://www.facebook.com/Scathc/
💖 Please Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQju4Bo1Tjk9SzhHQDknWaw?sub_confirmation=1
✍   has accused his ex-wife Amber Heard of cing him a "fat old man" and claimed she only married him to advance her acting career.  The actor and his former partner headed to London's High Court today as his libel trial against News Group Newspapers kicked off.  The actor, 57, is suing News Group Newspapers over a story published in The Sun in 201 which branded him a "wife beater" - which he denies.  Depp took to the witness stand today to give evidence about his marriage, while Heard is also expected to testify later in the case.  In a witness statement presented to the court, Depp claimed Heard manipulated him into marriage by faking interests in his films and hobbies.    He stated: "It was not until much later [after we met] that I understood that she had an agenda, namely to get married to me in order to progress her own career and/or to benefit financiy, and she knew how to bring it about.  "For example, at the time, she repeatedly told me how much she admired my films; however, lat ...
💖 #JohnnyDepp, #AmberHeard, #VanessaParadis, #WinonaRyder, #Marriage
